title: Arrrrr! font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me Id the font used for Arrrrr!

Thnaks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090618105041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Arrrrr2_6628.gif)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
[Staccato 555](http://web.archive.org/web/20090618105041/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/staccato-555/)

might also be called old choc or choc.
